Qualifiers.scope: Setback compliance for attached garages that are part of a residential main dwelling.
applicability: All residential lots where a garage is attached to the main dwelling
Applies to both interior lots and corner lots (setback types vary by lot configuration)
notes: Page title references 'Attached garages/carports site planning' but the prescriptive bullet explicitly names only 'attached garages'. Applicability to attached carports is not expressly stated in the rule text.

ambiguous_terms.issue: Title includes carports but operative sentence addresses only 'attached garages'.
ambiguous_terms.impact: Unclear whether attached carports must also comply with the same setbacks as the main dwelling.

Qualifiers.source_text: Attached garages must comply with same setbacks as main dwelling.

Variables.name: lot_type
Variables.description: Determines which side yard setback types apply (interior side vs. street-side).

Variables.name: required_setbacks_main_dwelling
Variables.description: Jurisdiction-defined minimum distances from respective lot lines to the main dwelling.

Variables.name: attached_garage_distance_to_front_lot_line
Variables.description: Shortest perpendicular distance from attached garage footprint to front lot line.

Variables.name: attached_garage_distance_to_interior_side_lot_line
Variables.description: Shortest perpendicular distance from attached garage footprint to interior side lot line.

Variables.name: attached_garage_distance_to_street_side_lot_line
Variables.description: Shortest perpendicular distance from attached garage footprint to street-side lot line (corner lots only).

Variables.name: attached_garage_distance_to_rear_lot_line
Variables.description: Shortest perpendicular distance from attached garage footprint to rear lot line.

Constants.name: setback_equivalency_requirement
Constants.description: Attached garages must meet the same minimum setback distances required of the main dwelling.
Constants.source_text: Attached garages must comply with same setbacks as main dwelling.

mandatory.description: Attached garage shall not encroach into any required setback that applies to the main dwelling.
mandatory.source_text: Attached garages must comply with same setbacks as main dwelling.

conditional.description: For corner lots, the attached garage shall also comply with the required street-side setback applicable to the main dwelling.
conditional.source_text: Attached garages must comply with same setbacks as main dwelling.

Relationships.description: The setback requirements for the attached garage are identical to those for the main dwelling.
Street-side setback requirement applies only to corner lots.

Relationships.note: Specific setback distances are defined elsewhere in the zoning/municipal code.

Qualifiers.scope: Location restrictions for uncovered parking spaces associated with residential lots.
applicability: All uncovered parking spaces on residential lots
Front-yard rule applies to all lots
Street-side yard rule applies where a street-side yard exists (corner lots)
notes: The figure set illustrates interior and corner lot examples; the street-side yard condition is only present on corner lots.

ambiguous_terms.issue: Could mean outside the required front yard area entirely or simply past the front setback line (behind it).
ambiguous_terms.assumed_interpretation: Uncovered spaces must be located outside the required front yard (i.e., behind the front setback line).

ambiguous_terms.term: beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard
ambiguous_terms.issue: Measurement datum for the 'first 10 feet' not explicitly defined.
ambiguous_terms.assumed_interpretation: Measured perpendicular from the street-side lot line into the lot within the street-side yard; uncovered spaces must be located at least 10 ft from the street-side lot line.

Qualifiers.source_text: Note: Uncovered spaces must be located beyond the required frontyard and beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard.

Variables.name: lot_type
Variables.description: Determines whether a street-side yard exists.

Variables.name: required_front_yard_setback
Variables.description: Jurisdiction-defined minimum front setback distance for the main dwelling (used here as the boundary for front-yard restriction).

Variables.name: uncovered_space_distance_to_front_lot_line
Variables.description: Shortest perpendicular distance from any uncovered parking space to the front lot line.

Variables.name: uncovered_space_distance_to_street_side_lot_line
Variables.description: Shortest perpendicular distance from any uncovered parking space to the street-side lot line (corner lots only).

Variables.name: street_side_yard_exists
Variables.description: True if the lot has a street-side yard (typically corner lots).

Constants.name: street_side_first_band_depth
Constants.description: Depth of the restricted band within the street-side yard where uncovered spaces are not allowed.
Constants.source_text: beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard.

mandatory.description: Uncovered parking spaces must be located outside the required front yard.
mandatory.source_text: Uncovered spaces must be located beyond the required frontyard.

conditional.description: On lots with a street-side yard, uncovered parking spaces must be located beyond the first 10 feet of the street-side yard.
conditional.source_text: Uncovered spaces must be located beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard.

Relationships.description: The 10 ft street-side restriction applies only if a street-side yard exists (generally corner lots).

references: Lot line and yard measurement methods
Relationships.note: Actual setback distances for the front yard are defined elsewhere in the zoning/municipal code.
